item.title: Creating a new Azure Active Directory User
item.description: Open the Azure Management Portal, login and then navigate to the Active Directory tab and click on the Active Directory resource you want to add a user to, alternatively create a new Azure Active Directory resource and then come back to this post.
item.author: website@gordonbeeming.com (Gordon Beeming)

item.title: Find organizations linked to your AAD tenant in Azure DevOps
